Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by California in 1970...
Injured on 8/13/1970 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/19/1971 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1973, off Moe Drabowsky (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/22/1973, off Tom Seaver (CHW)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/29/1973, hitting .524 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1973, hitting .313 with 8 HR, 82 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1975, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1976...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1977...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1978...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 8/18/1979...
Injured on 4/22/1980 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1981...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/17/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/11/1983...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/9/1984, off Len Barker (NYY)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1985, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1985, hitting .365 with 3 HR, 17 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against California on 5/17/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
